title: Big Bang Serenade
creator: Charles Eugene Anderson
description: Not even a war could stop Issac. In the backdrop of the Second World War. A private sits at his typewriter, and he needs peace and quiet to finish his tale. Not even an atomic blast will stop this writer from getting to the end of his tale.
subject: Isaac Asimov
